nodes.text: The Biitu system was a star system located in the Tadrin subsector of the Cassander sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim that contained at least two planets, including Biitu, the homeworld of the sentient Biituian species.

The Biitu system first appeared, albeit unidentified, in "The Great Heep," a television movie that aired as part of the Star Wars: Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO animated series, which originally aired on June 7, 1986. It was later identified in The Essential Atlas, a reference book written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace and released on August 18, 2009, which placed the system in grid square K-5.
